mapper.select: SELECT tbu.user_id,tbu.username,tbu.user_job_state,tj.job_name,tb.boss_name FROM tb_user tbu INNER JOIN tb_user_job tuj ON tuj.user_id = tbu.user_id INNER JOIN tb_job tj ON tj.job_id = tuj.job_id INNER JOIN tb_boss_job tbj ON tbj.job_id = tj.job_id INNER JOIN tb_boss tb ON tb.boss_id = tbj.boss_id WHERE tj.job_id =#{jobid}
